mapper.select: select t.tutor_id, t.name as tutor_name, email, c.course_id, c.name, description, start_date, end_date from tutors t left outer join addresses a on t.addr_id = a.addr_id right outer join courses c on t.tutor_id=c.tutor_id where t.tutor_id = #{tutorId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mybatis_dev.tutors (TUTOR_ID, NAME, EMAIL, gender) VALUES(#{tutorId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{gender});
